messages.title: Fighting for what local people want
messages.content: I campaigned with parents and teachers to stop the Tories closing popular schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work for affordable homes and good jobs, halt the export of precious green spaces.
The NHS is safe with Labour. I'll fight to keep up record investment in Medway.
Education is everyone's foundation for a brighter future. I'll continue fighting for, and investing in, our schools.
I'll publish my expenses so I'll be completely transparent.
I've lived in Rochester for 22 years. Our town's concerns and fight for justice matter to me.

issues.education: I campaigned with parents and teachers to stop the Tories closing popular schools.
issues.environment: Work for affordable homes and good jobs, halt the export of precious green spaces.
issues.health: The NHS is safe with Labour. I'll fight to keep up record investment in Medway.

housing.content: Work for affordable homes and good jobs

leaflet.personalStatement: Teresa fought to keep my daughter's school open.

endorsements.endorsement: When the local Tory Council tried to close our much loved local Infants school, Teresa stepped in and helped lead our successful campaign.

images.caption: Teresa at St Peter's Infant School
